00065             function                __construct()
00066             {
00067                   try
00068                   {
00069                         if( session_id() == '' )
00070                         {
00071                               session_start();
00072                         }
00073                         
00074                         $this->SecurityUtilities = get_package( 'security::security_utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00075                         $this->SupportedDataTypes = get_package( 'security::supported_data_types' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00076                   }
00077                   catch( Exception $e )
00078                   {
00079                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00080                   }
00081             }

00113             function                parse_parameters( $Params , $ParsingScript , $GlobalPredicates = '' )
00114             {
00115                   try
00116                   {
00117                         $GlobalPredicates = explode( ',' , $GlobalPredicates );
00118                         
00119                         $Result = new stdClass();
00120                         
00121                         $ParsingScript = str_replace( '#' , ';' , $ParsingScript );
00122                         $Script = explode( ';' , $ParsingScript );
00123                         
00124                         foreach( $Script as $s )
00125                         {
00126                               $s = explode( ':' , $s );
00127                               $FieldName = $s[ 0 ];
00128                               $Predicates = array_unique( array_merge( explode( ',' , $s[ 1 ] ) , $GlobalPredicates ) );
00129                               
00130                               $ValueWasSet = is_field_set( $Params , $FieldName );
00131                               if( $ValueWasSet === false )
00132                               {
00133                                     if( $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
00134                                     {
00135                                           $Default = $this->SecurityUtilities->get_default( $FieldName , $Predicates );
00136 
00137                                           if( $Default !== false )
00138                                           {
00139                                                 set_field( $Result , $FieldName , $Default );
00140                                           }
00141                                     }
00142                                     else
00143                                     {
00144                                           $s = serialize( $s );
00145                                           throw( new Exception( "Field \"$FieldName\" must be set, but it has not been set in $s" ) );
00146                                     }
00147                               }
00148                               else
00149                               {
00150                                     $Value = get_field( $Params , $FieldName );
00151                                     $Type = $this->SupportedDataTypes->get_type( $Predicates );
00152                                     $Alias = $this->SecurityUtilities->get_alias( $FieldName , $Predicates );
00153                                     
00154                                     set_field( $Result , $FieldName , $this->get( $Value , $Type ) );
00155                                     set_field( $Result , $Alias , get_field( $Result , $FieldName ) );
00156                               }
00157                         }
00158                         
00159                         return( $Result );
00160                   }
00161                   catch( Exception $e )
00162                   {
00163                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00164                   }
00165             }

00191             function                parse_http_parameters( $ParsingScript )
00192             {
00193                   try
00194                   {                       
00195                         return( $this->parse_parameters( array_merge( $_GET , $_POST ) , $ParsingScript ) );
00196                   }
00197                   catch( Exception $e )
00198                   {
00199                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00200                   }
00201             }

00225             function                dispatch_error_message( $Predicates )
00226             {
00227                   try
00228                   {
00229                         foreach( $Predicates as $p )
00230                         {
00231                               if( strpos( $p , 'err_msg_' ) === 0 )
00232                               {
00233                                     return( str_replace( 'err_msg_' , '' , $p ) );
00234                               }
00235                         }
00236                         return( false );
00237                   }
00238                   catch( Exception $e )
00239                   {
00240                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00241                   }
00242             }

00270             function                validate_custom_fields( $ValidatingData , $ParsingScript )
00271             {
00272                   try
00273                   {
00274                         $this->ErrorMessage = false;
00275                         $ParsingScript = str_replace( '#' , ';' , $ParsingScript );
00276                         $Script = explode( ';' , $ParsingScript );
00277 
00278                         foreach( $Script as $s )
00279                         {
00280                               $s = explode( ':' , $s );
00281                               $FieldName = $s[ 0 ];
00282                               $Predicates = explode( ',' , $s[ 1 ] );
00283                               $c = count( $Predicates );
00284                               for( $j = 0 ; $j < $c ; $j++ )
00285                               {
00286                                     switch( $Predicates[ $j ] )
00287                                     {
00288                                           case( 'email' ):
00289                                                 $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
00290 
00291                                                 if( $Value == '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
00292                                                 {
00293                                                       continue;
00294                                                 }
00295                                                 
00296                                                 if( $Value == '' || $this->get( $Value , 'email' ) != $Value )
00297                                                 {
00298                                                       $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00299                                                       return( false );
00300                                                 }
00301                                           break;
00302                                           case( 'float' ):
00303                                                 $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
00304                                                 
00305                                                 if( $Value === '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
00306                                                 {
00307                                                       continue;
00308                                                 }
00309                                                 
00310                                                 if( $Value === '' || $this->get( $Value , 'float' ) != $Value )
00311                                                 {
00312                                                       $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00313                                                       return( false );
00314                                                 }
00315                                           break;
00316                                           case( 'integer' ):
00317                                                 $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
00318                                                 
00319                                                 if( $Value === '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
00320                                                 {
00321                                                       continue;
00322                                                 }
00323                                                 
00324                                                 if( $Value === '' || $this->get( $Value , 'integer' ) != $Value )
00325                                                 {
00326                                                       $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00327                                                       return( false );
00328                                                 }
00329                                           break;
00330                                           case( 'raw' ):
00331                                           case( 'string' ):
00332                                                 $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
00333                                                 
00334                                                 if( $Value == '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) === false )
00335                                                 {
00336                                                       $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00337                                                       return( false );
00338                                                 }
00339                                           break;
00340                                           case( 'command' ):
00341                                                 $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
00342                                                 
00343                                                 if( $Value == '' && $this->SecurityUtilities->allow_not_set( $Predicates ) )
00344                                                 {
00345                                                       continue;
00346                                                 }
00347                                                 
00348                                                 if( $this->get( $Value , 'command' ) != $Value )
00349                                                 {
00350                                                       $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00351                                                       return( false );
00352                                                 }
00353                                           break;
00354                                           case( 'set' ):
00355                                                 if( isset( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] ) === false )
00356                                                 {
00357                                                       $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00358                                                       return( false );
00359                                                 }
00360                                           break;
00361                                           case( 'not_set' ):
00362                                                 if( isset( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] ) === true )
00363                                                 {
00364                                                       $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00365                                                       return( false );
00366                                                 }
00367                                           break;
00368                                           case( 'not_filled' ):
00369                                                 $Value = get_field( $ValidatingData , $FieldName , '' );
00370                                                 if( $Value != '' )
00371                                                 {
00372                                                       $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00373                                                       return( false );
00374                                                 }
00375                                           break;
00376                                           case( 'allow_not_set' ):
00377                                                 # nop
00378                                           break;
00379                                           default:
00380                                                 if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'default_' ) !== false )
00381                                                 {
00382                                                       continue;
00383                                                 }
00384                                                 if( $Predicates[ $j ] === 'set' )
00385                                                 {
00386                                                       if( isset( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] ) === false )
00387                                                       {
00388                                                             $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00389                                                             return( false );
00390                                                       }
00391                                                       continue;
00392                                                 }
00393                                                 if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'value_' ) === 0 )
00394                                                 {
00395                                                       $Value = str_replace( 'value_' , '' , $Predicates[ $j ] );
00396                                                       if( $this->get( @$ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] , 'raw' ) != $Value )
00397                                                       {
00398                                                             $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00399                                                             return( false );
00400                                                       }
00401                                                       continue;
00402                                                 }
00403                                                 if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'min_' ) === 0 )
00404                                                 {
00405                                                       $Value = intval( str_replace( 'min_' , '' , $Predicates[ $j ] ) );
00406                                                       if( $this->get( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] , 'raw' ) < $Value )
00407                                                       {
00408                                                             $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00409                                                             return( false );
00410                                                       }
00411                                                       continue;
00412                                                 }
00413                                                 if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'max_' ) === 0 )
00414                                                 {
00415                                                       $Value = intval( str_replace( 'max_' , '' , $Predicates[ $j ] ) );
00416                                                       if( $this->get( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] , 'raw' ) > $Value )
00417                                                       {
00418                                                             $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00419                                                             return( false );
00420                                                       }
00421                                                       continue;
00422                                                 }
00423                                                 if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'same_as_' ) === 0 )
00424                                                 {
00425                                                       $SecondField = str_replace( 'same_as_' , '' , $Predicates[ $j ] );
00426                                                       if( $this->get( $ValidatingData[ $FieldName ] , 'raw' ) !== 
00427                                                             $this->get( $this->get( $ValidatingData[ $SecondField ] , 'raw' ) , 'raw' ) )
00428                                                       {
00429                                                             $this->ErrorMessage = $this->dispatch_error_message( $Predicates );
00430                                                             return( false );
00431                                                       }
00432                                                       continue;
00433                                                 }
00434                                                 if( strpos( $Predicates[ $j ] , 'err_msg_' ) === 0 )
00435                                                 {
00436                                                       continue;
00437                                                 }
00438                                                 throw( new Exception( "Undefined predicate '".$Predicates[ $j ]."'" ) );
00439                                           break;
00440                                     }
00441                               }
00442                         }
00443                         
00444                         return( true );
00445                   }
00446                   catch( Exception $e )
00447                   {
00448                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00449                   }
00450             }

00479                   }
00480                   catch( Exception $e )

00482                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00483                   }

00520             function                get_global( $Field , $Type , $Mode , $DefaultValue = '_throw_exception' )
00521             {
00522                   try
00523                   {
00524                         if( $Mode & PREFIX_NAME )
00525                         {
00526                               $Data = array();
00527                               if( $Mode & POST )
00528                               {
00529                                     $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_POST );
00530                               }
00531                               if( $Mode & GET )
00532                               {
00533                                     $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_GET );
00534                               }
00535                               if( $Mode & COOKIE )
00536                               {
00537                                     $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_COOKIE );
00538                               }
00539                               if( $Mode & SESSION )
00540                               {
00541                                     $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_SESSION );
00542                               }
00543                               if( $Mode & SERVER )
00544                               {
00545                                     $Data = array_merge( $Data , $_SERVER );
00546                               }
00547                               if( $Mode & KEYS )
00548                               {
00549                                     $Data = array_keys( $Data );
00550                                     $FilterFunction = create_function( '$e' , "return( strpos( \$e , '$Field' ) === 0 );" );
00551                                     $Data = array_filter( $Data , $FilterFunction );
00552                                     
00553                                     $Data2 = array();
00554                                     
00555                                     foreach( $Data as $d )
00556                                     {
00557                                           $Data2 [] = str_replace( $Field , '' , $d );
00558                                     }
00559                                     
00560                                     return( $Data2 );
00561                               }
00562                               else
00563                               {
00564                                     $Data2 = array();
00565                                     
00566                                     foreach( $Data as $k => $v )
00567                                     {
00568                                           if( strpos( $k , $Field ) === 0 )
00569                                           {
00570                                                 $Data2[ str_replace( $Field , '' , $k ) ] = $v;
00571                                           }
00572                                     }
00573                                     
00574                                     return( $this->get( $Data2 , $Type ) );
00575                               }
00576                         }
00577                         if( $Mode & POST )
00578                         {
00579                               if( $this->get_p( $Field , 'set' ) )
00580                               {
00581                                     return( $this->get_p( $Field , $Type ) );
00582                               }
00583                         }
00584                         
00585                         if( $Mode & GET )
00586                         {
00587                               if( $this->get_g( $Field , 'set' ) )
00588                               {
00589                                     return( $this->get_g( $Field , $Type ) );
00590                               }
00591                         }
00592                         
00593                         if( $Mode & COOKIE )
00594                         {
00595                               if( $this->get_c( $Field , 'set' ) )
00596                               {
00597                                     return( $this->get_c( $Field , $Type ) );
00598                               }
00599                         }
00600                         
00601                         if( $Mode & SESSION )
00602                         {
00603                               if( $this->get_s( $Field , 'set' ) )
00604                               {
00605                                     return( $this->get_s( $Field , $Type ) );
00606                               }
00607                         }
00608                         
00609                         if( $Mode & SERVER )
00610                         {
00611                               if( $this->get_srv( $Field , 'set' ) )
00612                               {
00613                                     return( $this->get_srv( $Field , $Type ) );
00614                               }
00615                         }
00616                         
00617                         if( $Type === 'set' )
00618                         {
00619                               return( false );
00620                         }
00621                         else
00622                         {
00623                               if( $DefaultValue === '_throw_exception' )
00624                               {
00625                                     throw( new Exception( "Field '$Field' was not found" ) );
00626                               }
00627                               else
00628                               {
00629                                     return( $DefaultValue );
00630                               }
00631                         }
00632                   }
00633                   catch( Exception $e )
00634                   {
00635                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00636                   }
00637             }
00638

00941             function                reset_c( $Field , $Value , $Expire = 0 )
00942             {
00943                   try
00944                   {
00945                         setcookie( $Field , $Value , $Expire === 0 ? 0 : time() + $Expire );
00946                         $_COOKIE[ $Field ] = $Value;
00947                   }
00948                   catch( Exception $e )
00949                   {
00950                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00951                   }
00952             }

01082             function                get_value( &$Array , $Field , $Type = 'set' , $Default = '_throw_exception' )
01083             {
01084                   try
01085                   {
01086                         if( isset( $Array[ $Field ] ) )
01087                         {
01088                               if( $Type === 'set' )
01089                               {
01090                                     return( true );
01091                               }
01092                               return( $this->get( $Array[ $Field ] , $Type ) );
01093                         }
01094                         if( $Type === 'set' )
01095                         {
01096                               return( false );
01097                         }
01098                         else
01099                         {
01100                               if( $Default === '_throw_exception' )
01101                               {
01102                                     throw( new Exception( "Field $Field was not found" ) );
01103                               }
01104                               else
01105                               {
01106                                     return( $Default );
01107                               }
01108                         }
01109                         throw( new Exception( "Undefined data type" ) );
01110                   }
01111                   catch( Exception $e )
01112                   {
01113                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01114                   }
01115             }
01116

01273             function                get_srv( $Field , $Type = 'set' , $Default = '_throw_exception' )
01274             {
01275                   try
01276                   {
01277                         return( $this->get_value( $_SERVER , $Field , $Type , $Default ) );
01278                   }
01279                   catch( Exception $e )
01280                   {
01281                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01282                   }
01283             }
01284             
01315             function                get_c( $Field , $Type = 'set' , $Default = '_throw_exception' )
01316             {

01318                   {
01319                         return( $this->get_value( $_COOKIE , $Field , $Type , $Default ) );
01320                   }
01321                   catch( Exception $e )

01324                   }

01395             function                get( $Data , $Type )
01396             {
01397                   try
01398                   {
01399                         if( is_array( $Data ) || is_object( $Data ) )
01400                         {
01401                               return( $this->SupportedDataTypes->dispatch_complex_data( $Data , $Type ) );
01402                         }
01403                         
01404                         return( $this->SupportedDataTypes->process_data( $Data , $Type ) );
01405                   }
01406                   catch( Exception $e )
01407                   {
01408                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01409                   }
01410             }
01411       }
